channel.title: Xtrm Chaos
channel.description:
Hey everone. This is my first release. The base is from hybridpvp. I know many of you will say leech and thats fine. I started working on this to try to learn to code. Most of what I have done is basic things any newb can figure out.
[u]Changes I made:[/u]
New unique home Changed skilling area Added chillzone and staffzone Made it so you can attack Torms ad Corp (original hybridpvp dl you couldn't fight them) Master command for all players
[u]Known bugs (probably easy fixes, but can't figure it out)[/u]
Corp and Torms will not drop items. When client loads it looks like it freezes at 60%, but it just takes awhile to load.Dont know how to speed it up. Not really a bug, but trees are ugly. I think original base used object id 1276 instead of 1278.
[u]Media[/u]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/x5cuz.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NhAZB.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/izvEv.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/9AgTy.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/MBd7i.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/pkMhD.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/BrP4T.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/nTmgF.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uf6aS.png[/img]
Package link with Souce and Client: [url=http://uppit.com/f70g4zhdpsku/Xtrm_Chaos.rar]http://uppit.com/f70g4zhdpsku/Xtrm_Chaos.rar [/url]

Kwl bro, its your first release and tbh you have probably done a few good changes. 8/10 for effort
GJ bro and GL

item.title: Xtrm Chaos
item.dc:creator: @meher meher
item.description:
@meher wrote:

Hey uhm sorry to bother, but I suck at editing clients. How can I change the background? I just get an image of something and put it where?
Thanks.

EDIT: Sorry to bother I already found it

Read full topic

item.title: Xtrm Chaos
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“alltimenewb, post:9, topic:463318”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=566721.msg4121522#msg4121522 date=1349799103]
All you did is some stuff that isn’t even tutorial worthy;
Common sense.
I see nothing new, no moving npc’s isn’t considered new.
[/quote]
I said in the beginning that I only did basic things that anyone can do. Then later I asked for anything to make it more unique. The problem is that so many people have created so many servers that nothing is new unless you make customs which just ruin a server in my opinion. And I’m not trying to sound rude just asking how to make things better. I will be the first to admit I am not great at coding just trying to learn thats all.[/quote]
You could do a lot to this, you don’t have to be unique to make a good server.
Just an example, farming is probably the same old pi one like you see everywhere, why not writing a new one?

Read full topic

item.title: Xtrm Chaos
item.dc:creator: @meher meher
item.description:
@meher wrote:

[quote=“alltimenewb, post:11, topic:463318”][quote author=meher link=topic=566721.msg4121538#msg4121538 date=1349801062]
Hey uhm when I spawn torva it shows up as a null? Does it have different ID’s or did I do something wrong?
[/quote]
Well in item.cfg the id’s for torva are 13358, 13360, and 13362. If that doesn’t work I’m not sure whats wrong, it just worked fine for me. Maybe try buing from the staff shop in ::staffzone.[/quote]

Ohh yeah found it mate, thanks alot
I also found pernix & virtus, so gonna add them to the shop right away
Great release !

Read full topic

Ok so I’m working on V2 and have added a few things. Dicing is a pain so I’m just gonna scrap the dicing idea since there is the gambling npc at chill and donor zone. Since I’m a newb, quick question, would it be better to compress this into a rar or zip file?

item.title: Xtrm Chaos
item.dc:creator: @RebirthScape RebirthScape
item.description:
@RebirthScape wrote:

Well, it’s not like there’s anything negative with this.

  1. Not leeched.
  2. You tried your hardest.
  3. Your first release.

So, why not just go easy on you. I mean, I haven’t made any releases yet.

But, other than that…I’d say…8.5/10

Read full topic

item.title: Xtrm Chaos

item.description:
@alltimenewb wrote:

Thanks for the comments so far, even if you think it is shit thats fine. Any idea’s to make this unique or better will be welcome. Right now I’m trying to fix the bugs and hopefully add dicing soon.

item.title: Xtrm Chaos
item.dc:creator: @alltimenewb alltimenewb
item.description:
@alltimenewb wrote:

Hey everone. This is my first release. The base is from hybridpvp. I know many of you will say leech and thats fine. I started working on this to try to learn to code. Most of what I have done is basic things any newb can figure out.

Changes I made:

New unique home
Changed skilling area
Added chillzone and staffzone
Made it so you can attack Torms ad Corp (original hybridpvp dl you couldn’t fight them)
Master command for all players

Known bugs (probably easy fixes, but can’t figure it out)

Corp and Torms will not drop items.
When client loads it looks like it freezes at 60%, but it just takes awhile to load.Dont know how to speed it up.
Not really a bug, but trees are ugly. I think original base used object id 1276 instead of 1278.
